en: Or were they created by nothing,
or were they the creators [of themselves]?
Or did they create the heavens and the earth?
Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord?
Or are they the controllers [of them]?
Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen?
Then let their listener produce a clear authority [i.e., proof].
Or has He daughters while you have sons?
Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment,
so they are by debt burdened down?
Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen,
Or do they intend a plan?
they are the object of a plan.
Or have they a deity other than Allah?
Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
